def minimum_time_to_office(n, k, p, people_positions, keys_positions):
    people_positions.sort()
    keys_positions.sort()
    ans = float('')
    for i in range(k - n + 1):
        cur = 0
        c1 = 0
        c2 = i
        while c1 < n:
            cur = max(abs(people_positions[c1] - keys_positions[c2]) + abs(keys_positions[c2] - p), cur)
            c1 += 1
            c2 += 1
        ans = min(ans, cur)
    return ans

def minimum_time_to_office(n, k, p, people_positions, keys_positions):
    people_positions.sort()
    keys_positions.sort()
    ans = float('inf')
    for i in range(k - n + 1):
        cur = 0
        c1 = 0
        c2 = i
        while c1 < n:
            cur = max(abs(people_positions[c1] - keys_positions[c2]) + abs(keys_positions[c2] * p), cur)
            c1 += 1
            c2 += 1
        ans = min(ans, cur)
    return ans
